item.title: qonnect - mobile customer engagement platform
item.description: A mobile customer mobile engagement platform. A private and anonymous communication channel for you customers to interact with your business. Delivery of personalized campaigns on the mobile devices of your customers. Thatâ€™s qonnect.Send interactive messages to your customersEngage your customers with call to actions and push notificationsSimplify your customer relationship management and learn what your customers want from your businessUse Bluetooth Beacons to engage customers on your premisesqonnect offers upgradeable plans for membership, there is no limit for sending push notifications, no registration limit for Bluetooth Beacons and you can send as many scratch tickets to your customers as you want to.
